Plintissa charged on the outside.....wrapping her many tentacles around the
base and hanging on.....she swung from side to side in an unpredictable
pattern and dropped bombs on the Predacon side of the
battlefield..........Suukie was shocked that Liono didn't even notice the
one that took shots for him....Suukie suddenly felt ashamed he had worked so
hard and everyone thought he was annoying...something inside him
snapped.....Suukie aimed and shot down Plintissa!........Suukie then aimed
and shot all Predacons and all Maximals!...Suukie then aimed and shot at
Deathstorm!.....then he aimed and shot at Dinobot and then Tavatron! then he
shot at Liono Prime!...... "die, Kluster!....die Dinobot!.....die
Tavatron!.......die Plintissa!......die Liono!.....die friends!......die
friends!......friends.....what friends....in the end....." he said.....a
shocked and confused look on his face.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 29, 2000 4:12 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * Iron Raptor snarled as she saw the Predacon's enter the Ark, she opened
> her com-link to Iris...*
>
> " Iris, the Predacons are getting inside of the base, stop them!*
> IRIS: "On it!"
>
> * Iris scanned through the Arks programming and located the damaged
shields,
> she refigured and repaired most of the components, soon a green shield
began
> to glow on the outside of the Ark...a temporary shield running off of
Iris's
> power supply. She then began to activate the Arks internal defences,
> auto-guns began to drop from the roof on the inside. Iris targeted the
> chest-plate of every Predacon that entered the ship and fired upon them,
> lasers lightened up the room as the auto-guns fired upon the intruders.
> However, she made careful aim to insure that no other transformer was
> damaged other then the Predacons.
> Now, it was her defending the Ark!*
>
